QuestData.Title: A New Beginning
QuestData.Description: It remains uncertain whether or not our people can ever rekindle the affection we once held for Thorim.$b$bMay this armor, if nothing else, remind him of the days when we stood together in honor, invincible.
QuestData.LogDescription: Njormeld wants you to take the Reforged Armor to Thorim at the Temple of Storms.
QuestData.RewardText: <As you present Thorim with the reforged suit of armor, he is visibly stricken by its splendor.>$b$bYou have done well, $r, but there remains much to be done.
